title: Kurdish commander says Trump promised to maintain long term support: tweet
text:
FILE PHOTO - Mazloum Kobani, SDF commander in chief is pictured during an interview with Reuters in Ain Issa, Syria, December 13, 2018. REUTERS/Rodi Said

BEIRUT (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump promised to maintain long-term support for Kurdish-led forces who control large swathes of northeastern Syria, Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) commander Mazloum Kobani said on Wednesday.

Kobani, who said he had a phone call with Trump, added in a tweet that Trump pledged he would extend support in “various fields.”
description: U.S. President Donald Trump promised to maintain long-term support for Kurdish-led forces who control large swathes of northeastern Syria, Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) commander Mazloum Kobani said on Wednesday.
